content.text:
# 2009 Origins Award winners

The following are the winners of the 36th annual (2009) Origins Award, presented at Origins 2010.
{| class="wikitable"
! Category
! Winner
! Company
! Designer(s)
|-
|Best Historical Miniature Figure or Line
|Wings of War: Albatross D. III
|Nexus Editrice
|

|Battlefront Miniatures, LTD
|
|-

|Nexus Editrice
|Andrea Angiolino, Pier Glorgio Paglia
|-

|Academy Games
|Uwe Eickert, John Hill, Dana Lombardy
|-

|-

|-
